name: European Democrat Students
goal:
EDS, European Democrat Students was established in 1961 by Ring Christlich-Demokratischer Studenten (Germany), Høyres Studenter (Norway), Fria Moderata Studenterforbund (Sweden), and Aktionsgemeinschaft (Austria). EDS is the official student organisation of the Europeans People´s Party, representing 1.600.000 students from 40 different student organisations from 35 different countries. EDS is a center-right student organisation of Christian Democrats, Liberals, and Conservative organisations.
Our aim is to spread our values ​​throughout Europe through our member organizations
interests: Budget, Communication, Competition, Culture, Development, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Youth
euInitiatives:
As a students organisation EDS follows the development of the Erasmus+ programme closely, as well as cooperating on a weekly basis with the Youth Intergroup in the European Parliament.

Additionally, our organisation follow the work of the Energy union, the Single Digital Market, TTIP, Immigration and Migration Policy, and the EU Foreign Affairs Policy.

As the official Students organisation of the EPP we follow the work of the EPP Group, and its committee members, and in particular the CULT and EMPL committees.
